'''''Of The Darkening Of Valinor And The Flight Of The Noldor''''' is a double sided LP record comprising readings of excerpts from ''[[The Silmarillion]]'', read by [[Christopher Tolkien]]. Side 1 includes readings of Chapter Eight ''[[Of the Darkening of Valinor]]'' and the start of Chapter Nine ''[[Of the Flight of the Noldor]]''. Side 2 completes ''Of the Flight of the Noldor''.
==Side One, Read By Christopher Tolkien (28:56)==
* '''[[Of the Darkening of Valinor]]''' (Chapter Eight)
* '''[[Of the Flight of the Noldor]]''' (Chapter Nine) (beginning)



==Side Two, Read By Christopher Tolkien (31:29)==
* '''[[Of the Flight of the Noldor]]''' (Chapter Nine) (conclusion)
